metadataAttributes.Title: Getting Started with Git and GitHub
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Get started with Git and GitHub in this self-paced, introductory course! You’ll become familiar with collaborative version control and popular Git platforms. Collaboration and social coding are crucial parts of contemporary Software Engineering practices and the DevOps culture.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Distributed Version Control (DRCS),open source,Version Control Systems,Github,Git (Software),
